job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>**This is a fulltime role and doesn't sponsor**</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>REQUIREMENTS/CHARACTERISTICS:</strong></p><ul><li>10 years’ experience&nbsp;building large scale, real-time distributed systems&nbsp;with solid coding,problem-solving, and design skills</li><li>Experience working in highly collaborative teams</li><li>Ability to demonstrate a team-first attitude towards software development</li><li>Hands on Experience with Python, Java, SQL</li><li>Experience working with various&nbsp;data&nbsp;stores: SQL, NoSQL, and/or key-value store</li><li>Mature&nbsp;engineering&nbsp;practices (CI/CD, testing, secure coding, etc)</li><li>Experience with, or willingness to learn:</li><li>Event-driven architecture and messaging frameworks (Pub/Sub, Kafka, and/or&nbsp;RabbitMQ)</li><li>Cloud infrastructure (Google Cloud Platform, AWS, and/or Azure)</li></ul>
